original_title: WP term tests postponed to March 21, 22
original_body_lines: The Western Provincial Education Zone has taken steps to postpone the third-term tests, which were scheduled to be held tomorrow.
The Western Province Education Director, Srilal Nonis, told the Daily Mirror that the term test that was scheduled to be held tomorrow will be postponed until March 21 and 22.

He said the decision was taken as tomorrow's trade union action could affect the transport system where most of the children use public transport to travel to school. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrame)
